an3.122:1: "Tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, moneyyāni. Katamāni tīṇi? Kāyamoneyyaṁ, vacīmoneyyaṁ, manomoneyyaṁ.
an3.122:2: Katamañca, bhikkhave, vacīmoneyyaṁ? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti, pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti, samphappalāpā paṭivirato hoti. Idaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, vacīmoneyyaṁ.
an3.122:3: Katamañca, bhikkhave, manomoneyyaṁ? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati. Idaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, manomoneyyaṁ.
an3.122:5: Āpāyiko dullabho appameyyaṁ,Āneñjavipattisampadā;Apaṇṇako ca kammanto,Dve soceyyāni moneyyanti.
